description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with condition 1 (Commencement Date) of Planning Permission 17/16547/FUL (Demolition of the existing buildings and erection of a part 3 part 4 storey mixed use building with basement level car parking, ground floor office, and 19 residential apartments, with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage) to allow extension of commencement date of works to 4 years from date of decision.
decision_conditions: Section 73 (5) directs that planning permission must not be granted under this section for the development of land in England to the extent that it has effect to change a condition subject to which a previous planning permission was granted by extending the time within whichâ€”(a)a development must be started;
